about_the_game:
Save the city from the mad cow balls and destroy the bricks. Gain skillpoints from high score and completing levels. Use the skillpoints to upgrade your balls, weapons and gain access to the 60+ power ups!

  • 60+ power ups.
  • 40+ upgrades.
  • 10 different kind of balls.
  • Level generator.
  • Multi bonuses.
  • Multi layer levels.
  • Press and hold to spinn the ball.
  • Gamepad support with autodetect.
detailed_description:
Save the city from the mad cow balls and destroy the bricks. Gain skillpoints from high score and completing levels. Use the skillpoints to upgrade your balls, weapons and gain access to the 60+ power ups!

  • 60+ power ups.
  • 40+ upgrades.
  • 10 different kind of balls.
  • Level generator.
  • Multi bonuses.
  • Multi layer levels.
  • Press and hold to spinn the ball.
  • Gamepad support with autodetect.
name: MadCowBalls2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.8ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Save the city from the mad cow balls and destroy the bricks. Gain skillpoints from high score and completing levels. Use the skillpoints to upgrade your balls, weapons and gain access to the 60+ power ups!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
